title: Trump and Mamdani to Meet at the White House
text: “My team reached out to the White House to set up this meeting because I will work with anyone to make life more affordable for the more than 8.5 million people who call this city home.” “Good afternoon, everybody. It speaks volumes that tomorrow we have a communist coming to the White House. I also think it speaks to the fact that President Trump is willing to meet with anyone.”
